caption: FTP Activity
description: File Transfer Protocol (FTP) Activity events report file transfers between a server and a client as seen on the network.
name: ftp_activity

1.caption: Put
1.description: File upload to the FTP or SFTP site.

2.caption: Get
2.description: File download from the FTP or SFTP site.

3.caption: Poll
3.description: Poll directory for specific file(s) or folder(s) at the FTP or SFTP site location.

4.caption: Delete
4.description: Delete file(s) from the FTP or SFTP site.

5.caption: Rename
5.description: Rename the file(s) in the FTP or SFTP site.

6.caption: List
6.description: List files in a specified directory.

codes.description: The list of return codes to the FTP command.

command_responses.description: The list of responses to the FTP command.

file.description: The file that is the target of the FTP activity.

name.description: The name of the data affiliated with the command.

port.description: The dynamic port established for impending data transfers.

type.description: The type of FTP network connection (e.g. active, passive).
